Retrieves information about the status of asynchronous operations initiated by the disks resource. All operations that are either in-flight or completed but not yet queried will be returned.
Retrieves information about the status of an asynchronous operation initiated by the disks resource.

size.description: Disk size in gibibytes (GiB) or tebibytes (TiB) in the format [Size][GiB|TiB]

patch.description:
Change the size of a disk.
Size should be in gibibytes (GiB) or tebibytes (TiB) in the format [Size][GiB|TiB]. E.g. 10GiB.
A successful response from this resource will contain the async operation.

size.description: New disk size in gibibytes (GiB) or tebibytes (TiB) in the format [Size][GiB|TiB]
Disk size in gibibytes (GiB) or tebibytes (TiB) in the format [Size][GiB|TiB]

post.description:
Create a new disk.
Size should be in gibibytes (GiB) or tebibytes (TiB) in the format [Size][GiB|TiB]. E.g. 10GiB.
A successful response from this resource will contain the async operation.
